snippet.title: The Real Face of a VTuber｜Teaser Trailer.v2｜PC Steam
snippet.description:
Comedy x Beautiful Girls x Intriguing Mysteries
Can you discover the person hidden behind the VTuber?
"Catch me if you can!"

The Real Face of a VTuber is a courtroom investigation visual novel. You play as Prosecutor Justin Truth, investigating a murder at a VTuber agency where that VTuber's real face is the key to cracking the entire case.

WISHLIST & FOLLOW to get notified when the game launches! 
https://reurl.cc/54jj4G

Follow us on social media!
https://twitter.com/liliengames

Trailer:Marcy
Music:甘茶の音楽工房

#TheRealFaceOfAVtuber #CatChKuripa #VTuber
